collectible.title: First Job T-Shirt
collectible.subtitle: Did someone order an extra sausage pizza?
collectible.text: Standard issue PizzaWhat! employee shirt. Now you too can live out your days as a struggling pizza boy living paycheck to paycheck! Hooray work!
collectible.unlock: Have Dwight lose a game in his "Special Delivery" costume.

collectible.title: Standard Tie
collectible.subtitle: A ratty tie fit for a pointless life of office work.
collectible.text:
A standard tie Dwight found at a thrift shop, as he couldn't afford anything better.
Pictured is Dwight's attempt at modeling. Maybe stick to generators, Dwight...
